definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[אָבַל]] Is 24:7 + 2 t. etc. Impf. 3 fs. [[תֶּאֱבַל]] Ho 4:3 + 3 t.—mourn, lament (poet. & higher style); abs., human subj. Joe 1:9, Am 8:8, Am 9:5, Is 19:8 (‖[[אנה ]]) cf. Job 14:22 (subj. [[נַפְשׁוֹ]]); sq. [[על]] Ho 10:5; more oft. fig., inanim. subj., gates Is 3:26; land Is 24:4, Is 33:9, Ho 4:3, Joe 1:10, Je 4:28 (sq. [[על]]) Je 12:4, Je 23:10 cf. Je 12:11 (sq. [[על]]), [[יְהוּדָה]] Je 14:2 ; pastures Am 1:2.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: —Pf. [[הִתְאַבֵּל]] 1Sa 15:35; Impf. [[יִתְאַבָָּל]] Ez Eze 7:12, Eze 7:27; [[וַיִּתְאַבֵּל]] Ge 37:34 + 3 t. etc.; Imv. fs. [[הִתְאַבְּלִי]] 2Sa 14:2; Pt. [[מִתְאַבֵּל]] 1Sa 16:1 + 2 t. etc.;—mourn (mostly prose) esp. for dead, sq. [[על]] Ge 37:34, 2Sa 13:37, 2Sa 14:2, 2Sa 19:2 ‖[[בכה]] 2Ch 35:24, cf. also Is 66:10 (over Jerusalem); abs. 1Ch 7:22; cf. 2Sa 14:2 play the mourner (where indic. by dress); over un-worthy Saul sq. [[אֶל]] 1Sa 15:35, 1Sa 16:1; over sin sq. [[על]] Ezr 10:6 cf. (abs.) Ne 8:9; judgment of ´[[י]] Ex 33:4 abs. (indic. by dress), Nu 14:39, Ez Eze 7:27 (del. B Co); sq. [[כִּי]] 1Sa 6:19; calamity Ne 1:4, Ez Eze 7:12 cf. Da 10:2.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הֶאֱבַלְתִּי]] Ez Eze 31:15; Impf. [[וַיַּאֲבֶל־]] La 2:8; —cause to mourn; Ez Eze 31:15 abs. MT, but A BCo obj. [[תהום]] sq. [[על]], caused the deep to mourn over; La 2:8 obj. wall etc.; (both these fig., cf. Qal).
